title: Castle Charming
description: Welcome to Charming, where fairy tales come true (whether you like it or not). Kai's new job is to report on the scandals of the messed up royal family for the local newspaper. He didn’t expect to become the story. Dennis signed up to protect the princes. Falling in love with one was never part of the deal. Ziyi wished for her own Prince Charming… but wishes come at a cost, when fairies are involved.In this magical kingdom of cursed spinning wheels, violent beanstalks, deadly queens and disaster princes, the most dangerous thing of all might be a Happily Ever After. Castle Charming collects five previously published stories and novellas: Glass Slipper Scandal, Dance Princes Dance, Charm or Dare, Let Sleeping Princes Lie and Dead Queen Walking.
author: Tansy Rayner Roberts
